page.title: 19DOLPHIN CANDLES
page.content: Upon the road to Membury there is a house called {Myrtle}Cottage.The lady who owns it makes candles.In her show_room are many small animal candles,which can sometimes be seen at the Honiton Show in August.The show_room is open every day from 9.00a.m. to 6.00p.m.The lady who makes the candles buys the wax,which is melted into a liquid and poured into rubber moulds.Then she melts the paint before placing the hardened wax figures into it.She counts to five and takes them out.The extras are painted on by hand. Her husband is a miniaturist making beautiful dolls'houses by hand.These can also be seen in the show_room. Joy Prince age 9.
